com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.v5.utils

Class DownloadTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<okhttp3.ResponseBody,java.lang.Void,java.io.File>
      • com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.v5.utils.DownloadTask

  • public class DownloadTask
extends android.os.AsyncTask<okhttp3.ResponseBody,java.lang.Void,java.io.File>
    This class is an AsyncTask that downloads a file from a ResponseBody.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  DownloadTask.DownloadListener
      Interface which allows a Listener to be updated upon the completion of a DownloadTask.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.os.AsyncTask

        android.os.AsyncTask.Status

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class android.os.AsyncTask

        SERIAL_EXECUTOR, THREAD_POOL_EXECUTOR

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DownloadTask(java.lang.String destDirectory, java.lang.String extension, DownloadTask.DownloadListener downloadListener)
      Creates a DownloadTask with a blank file name, so each subsequent file will just be named numerically.
      DownloadTask(java.lang.String destDirectory, java.lang.String fileName, java.lang.String extension, DownloadTask.DownloadListener downloadListener)
      Creates a DownloadTask which will download the input stream into the given destinationDirectory with the specified file name and file extension.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DownloadTask

        public DownloadTask(java.lang.String destDirectory,
                    java.lang.String extension,
                    DownloadTask.DownloadListener downloadListener)
        Creates a DownloadTask with a blank file name, so each subsequent file will just be named numerically.
        Parameters:
        destDirectory - path to the directory where file should be downloaded
        extension - file extension of the resulting file
        downloadListener - listener to be updated on completion of the task

      • DownloadTask

        public DownloadTask(java.lang.String destDirectory,
                    java.lang.String fileName,
                    java.lang.String extension,
                    DownloadTask.DownloadListener downloadListener)
        Creates a DownloadTask which will download the input stream into the given destinationDirectory with the specified file name and file extension. If a listener is passed
        Parameters:
        destDirectory - path to the directory where file should be downloaded
        fileName - name to name the file
        extension - file extension of the resulting file
        downloadListener - listener to be updated on completion of the task
